00036  * file in each example directory ("lpc17xx_libcfg.h") must be included,

00053 /*********************************************************************/
00059 void SPI_SetClock (LPC_SPI_TypeDef *SPIx, uint32_t target_clock)
00060 {
00061         uint32_t spi_pclk;
00062         uint32_t prescale, temp;
00063 
00064         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00065 
00066         if (SPIx == LPC_SPI){
00067                 spi_pclk =  CLKPWR_GetPCLK (CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_SPI);
00068         } else {
00069                 return;
00070         }
00071 
00072         prescale = 8;
00073         // Find closest clock to target clock
00074         while (1){
00075                 temp = target_clock * prescale;
00076                 if (temp >= spi_pclk){
00077                         break;
00078                 }
00079                 prescale += 2;
00080                 if(prescale >= 254){
00081                         break;
00082                 }
00083         }
00084 
00085         // Write to register
00086         SPIx->SPCCR = SPI_SPCCR_COUNTER(prescale);
00087 }

00090 /*********************************************************************/
00096 void SPI_DeInit(LPC_SPI_TypeDef *SPIx)
00097 {
00098         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00099 
00100         if (SPIx == LPC_SPI){
00101                 /* Set up clock and power for SPI module */
00102                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCSPI, DISABLE);
00103         }
00104 }
00105 
00106 /*********************************************************************/
00111 uint8_t SPI_GetDataSize (LPC_SPI_TypeDef *SPIx)
00112 {
00113         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00114         return ((SPIx->SPCR)>>8 & 0xF);
00115 }
00116 
00117 /********************************************************************/
00126 void SPI_Init(LPC_SPI_TypeDef *SPIx, SPI_CFG_Type *SPI_ConfigStruct)
00127 {
00128         uint32_t tmp;
00129 
00130         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00131 
00132         if(SPIx == LPC_SPI){
00133                 /* Set up clock and power for UART module */
00134                 CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCSPI, ENABLE);
00135         } else {
00136                 return;
00137         }
00138 
00139         // Configure SPI, interrupt is disable as default
00140         tmp = ((SPI_ConfigStruct->CPHA) | (SPI_ConfigStruct->CPOL) \
00141                 | (SPI_ConfigStruct->DataOrder) | (SPI_ConfigStruct->Databit) \
00142                 | (SPI_ConfigStruct->Mode) | SPI_SPCR_BIT_EN) & SPI_SPCR_BITMASK;
00143         // write back to SPI control register
00144         SPIx->SPCR = tmp;
00145 
00146         // Set clock rate for SPI peripheral
00147         SPI_SetClock(SPIx, SPI_ConfigStruct->ClockRate);
00148 
00149         // If interrupt flag is set, Write '1' to Clear interrupt flag
00150         if (SPIx->SPINT & SPI_SPINT_INTFLAG){
00151                 SPIx->SPINT = SPI_SPINT_INTFLAG;
00152         }
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 
00157 /*****************************************************************************/
00169 void SPI_ConfigStructInit(SPI_CFG_Type *SPI_InitStruct)
00170 {
00171         SPI_InitStruct->CPHA = SPI_CPHA_FIRST;
00172         SPI_InitStruct->CPOL = SPI_CPOL_HI;
00173         SPI_InitStruct->ClockRate = 1000000;
00174         SPI_InitStruct->DataOrder = SPI_DATA_MSB_FIRST;
00175         SPI_InitStruct->Databit = SPI_DATABIT_8;
00176         SPI_InitStruct->Mode = SPI_MASTER_MODE;
00177 }
00178 
00179 /*********************************************************************/
00186 void SPI_SendData(LPC_SPI_TypeDef* SPIx, uint16_t Data)
00187 {
00188         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00189 
00190         SPIx->SPDR = Data & SPI_SPDR_BITMASK;
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 
00195 /*********************************************************************/
00200 uint16_t SPI_ReceiveData(LPC_SPI_TypeDef* SPIx)
00201 {
00202         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00203 
00204         return ((uint16_t) (SPIx->SPDR & SPI_SPDR_BITMASK));
00205 }

00207 /*********************************************************************/
00221 int32_t SPI_ReadWrite (LPC_SPI_TypeDef *SPIx, SPI_DATA_SETUP_Type *dataCfg, \
00222                                                 SPI_TRANSFER_Type xfType)
00223 {
00224         uint8_t *rdata8;
00225     uint8_t *wdata8;
00226         uint16_t *rdata16;
00227     uint16_t *wdata16;
00228     uint32_t stat;
00229     uint32_t temp;
00230     uint8_t dataword;
00231 
00232         //read for empty buffer
00233         temp = SPIx->SPDR;
00234         //dummy to clear status
00235         temp = SPIx->SPSR;
00236         dataCfg->counter = 0;
00237         dataCfg->status = 0;
00238 
00239         if(SPI_GetDataSize (SPIx) == 8)
00240                 dataword = 0;
00241         else dataword = 1;
00242         if (xfType == SPI_TRANSFER_POLLING){
00243 
00244                 if (dataword == 0){
00245                         rdata8 = (uint8_t *)dataCfg->rx_data;
00246                         wdata8 = (uint8_t *)dataCfg->tx_data;
00247                 } else {
00248                         rdata16 = (uint16_t *)dataCfg->rx_data;
00249                         wdata16 = (uint16_t *)dataCfg->tx_data;
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 while(dataCfg->counter < dataCfg->length)
00253                 {
00254                         // Write data to buffer
00255                         if(dataCfg->tx_data == NULL){
00256                                 if (dataword == 0){
00257                                         SPI_SendData(SPIx, 0xFF);
00258                                 } else {
00259                                         SPI_SendData(SPIx, 0xFFFF);
00260                                 }
00261                         } else {
00262                                 if (dataword == 0){
00263                                         SPI_SendData(SPIx, *wdata8);
00264                                         wdata8++;
00265                                 } else {
00266                                         SPI_SendData(SPIx, *wdata16);
00267                                         wdata16++;
00268                                 }
00269                         }
00270                         // Wait for transfer complete
00271                         while (!((stat = SPIx->SPSR) & SPI_SPSR_SPIF));
00272                         // Check for error
00273                         if (stat & (SPI_SPSR_ABRT | SPI_SPSR_MODF | SPI_SPSR_ROVR | SPI_SPSR_WCOL)){
00274                                 // save status
00275                                 dataCfg->status = stat | SPI_STAT_ERROR;
00276                                 return (dataCfg->counter);
00277                         }
00278                         // Read data from SPI dat
00279                         temp = (uint32_t) SPI_ReceiveData(SPIx);
00280 
00281                         // Store data to destination
00282                         if (dataCfg->rx_data != NULL)
00283                         {
00284                                 if (dataword == 0){
00285                                         *(rdata8) = (uint8_t) temp;
00286                                         rdata8++;
00287                                 } else {
00288                                         *(rdata16) = (uint16_t) temp;
00289                                         rdata16++;
00290                                 }
00291                         }
00292                         // Increase counter
00293                         if (dataword == 0){
00294                                 dataCfg->counter++;
00295                         } else {
00296                                 dataCfg->counter += 2;
00297                         }
00298                 }
00299 
00300                 // Return length of actual data transferred
00301                 // save status
00302                 dataCfg->status = stat | SPI_STAT_DONE;
00303                 return (dataCfg->counter);
00304         }
00305         // Interrupt mode
00306         else {
00307 
00308                 // Check if interrupt flag is already set
00309                 if(SPIx->SPINT & SPI_SPINT_INTFLAG){
00310                         SPIx->SPINT = SPI_SPINT_INTFLAG;
00311                 }
00312                 if (dataCfg->counter < dataCfg->length){
00313                         // Write data to buffer
00314                         if(dataCfg->tx_data == NULL){
00315                                 if (dataword == 0){
00316                                         SPI_SendData(SPIx, 0xFF);
00317                                 } else {
00318                                         SPI_SendData(SPIx, 0xFFFF);
00319                                 }
00320                         } else {
00321                                 if (dataword == 0){
00322                                         SPI_SendData(SPIx, (*(uint8_t *)dataCfg->tx_data));
00323                                 } else {
00324                                         SPI_SendData(SPIx, (*(uint16_t *)dataCfg->tx_data));
00325                                 }
00326                         }
00327                         SPI_IntCmd(SPIx, ENABLE);
00328                 } else {
00329                         // Save status
00330                         dataCfg->status = SPI_STAT_DONE;
00331                 }
00332                 return (0);
00333         }
00334 }

00337 /********************************************************************/
00346 void SPI_IntCmd(LPC_SPI_TypeDef *SPIx, FunctionalState NewState)
00347 {
00348         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00349         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_FUNCTIONALSTATE(NewState));
00350 
00351         if (NewState == ENABLE)
00352         {
00353                 SPIx->SPCR |= SPI_SPCR_SPIE;
00354         }
00355         else
00356         {
00357                 SPIx->SPCR &= (~SPI_SPCR_SPIE) & SPI_SPCR_BITMASK;
00358         }
00359 }
00360 
00361 
00362 /********************************************************************/
00367 IntStatus SPI_GetIntStatus (LPC_SPI_TypeDef *SPIx)
00368 {
00369         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00370 
00371         return ((SPIx->SPINT & SPI_SPINT_INTFLAG) ? SET : RESET);
00372 }
00373 
00374 /********************************************************************/
00379 void SPI_ClearIntPending(LPC_SPI_TypeDef *SPIx)
00380 {
00381         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00382 
00383         SPIx->SPINT = SPI_SPINT_INTFLAG;
00384 }
00385 
00386 /********************************************************************/
00398 uint32_t SPI_GetStatus(LPC_SPI_TypeDef* SPIx)
00399 {
00400         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPIx(SPIx));
00401 
00402         return (SPIx->SPSR & SPI_SPSR_BITMASK);
00403 }
00404 
00405 /********************************************************************/
00419 FlagStatus SPI_CheckStatus (uint32_t inputSPIStatus,  uint8_t SPIStatus)
00420 {
00421         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_SPI_STAT(SPIStatus));
00422 
00423         return ((inputSPIStatus & SPIStatus) ? SET : RESET);
00424 }
